website_summaries.verdict: This coozie has a neck strap to keep your drink handy when you don't have a holder nearby.
pros: Can also hold a pint glass well
Made from neoprene, which is lightweight and keeps your drink cool for a decent amount of time
cons: When a can is very full, it can be easy to spill

customer_reviews.title: The most fun you can have without using your hands.
customer_reviews.text: Prepare to dazzle everybody on the trails. These bad boys allow you to do all the "hold my beer and watch this" you heart desires without the hassle of handing off your beer. Whether you're a casual sunset hiker, playing cornhole at a barbeque, or base jumping in a speedo this will keep your ice cold brewski on deck. This neck coozie is a necessity in every beer drinkers arsenal; rumor has it, it can also be used for beverages other than beer, but I've never actually tested this theory myself. If you're on the fence of whether to order this or not, free up your hands and get over the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Strap too short. Spills drink.
customer_reviews.text: The strap is way too short & spills your drink. It's quality material but the 3 pack by another seller is better. Longer strap with spinning hooks that keep your drink level.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you’d expect. This is convenient so you can play a game, grill, etc without putting down your beer. If it is full it can spill if you’re not careful. The koozie is pretty thin and wouldn’t keep your drink cold for too long.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coozie for Activities and Just Hanging Out
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and product! Love these coozies. The necklace piece is the perfect height to hold a drink while still allowing me to fish, and the coozie piece keeps my drink cold. I used one while fly fishing on the lower Sac a couple weeks ago and it was perfect. It is comfortable to wear too... No seams or scratchiness. I have actually started wearing this around the house while taking care of the kids too. I was always losing my drink and the kids were always knocking it over, so this solves both issues!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for the outdoor adventure
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our canoeing trip. Saved a couple drinks from floating away. Wish they made a skinny can option
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for for those unable to use their arms to drink beverages!
customer_reviews.text: We actually purchased this for a friend who is suffering from ALS, which is taking away her ability to hold a cup, among other things. We found the perfect sized cup with a top and can fill it a beverage and a long straw and is she able to drink without much assistance. Just a minor adjustment needed to shorten the strap. Works well!
customer_reviews.author: Denese Cosper

customer_reviews.title: Works decent but over priced
customer_reviews.text: These work but were pretty pricey. Only ordered because it was the only brand that could be delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Juranas

customer_reviews.title: Give'r Hands Free Neck Coozie Beverage Insulator - 4 Pack (Dark Grey)
customer_reviews.text: Give'r Hands Free Neck Coozie Beverage Insulator - 4 Pack (Dark Grey)
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: these are awesome
customer_reviews.text: everybody that see mine, asks about it and where to get it
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Hands free
customer_reviews.text: I am giving5 stars because of the handy strap. I flag traffic often on my construction job & this coozie left my hands free. Also if you bend down it's like a counterweight in its action in that it stays level. Using it at home you never have to say "hold my beer & watch this".
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice to hold your beverage but if you are walking it can start to splash
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Olivarez III

customer_reviews.title: You'll need more than one with friends around
customer_reviews.text: Works for hands free drinking when you need both hands for other tasks
customer_reviews.author: Craig Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my float trip for half the price at the rental place
customer_reviews.author: Simon Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Got two in a "four pack"
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised except that my four pack was a two pack, not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Darren David Maurer

customer_reviews.title: In a wheelchair... lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Loved! In a wheelchair and my wife got it for me for when we went to New Orleans!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... explain this product other than to say it is amazing! Love having it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to explain this product other than to say it is amazing! Love having it! Makes hands free easy and awesome. No matter what the age!
customer_reviews.author: kelleyswiney

customer_reviews.title: Beer Festival staple...
customer_reviews.text: Used this at a beer festival and was asked on numerous occasions where we got them. Very popular and holds a pint glass very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Scott

customer_reviews.title: Hands free freedom to paddle.
customer_reviews.text: Solution finally found to SUP freedom to hold a drink while paddling. Love the product. Bought for a friend and me too.
customer_reviews.author: TamTam

customer_reviews.title: Drink a beer while playing golf at the same time
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long-time supporter of Give'r and load up on using neck coozies for all my summer activities. My favorite is to have it on the golf course because you can lean over to pick up your golf ball on the ground and the beer will not fall out of the coozie holder. It is a perfect gift for anyone that enjoys having a cold one on the course or anywhere outside with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Duchen

customer_reviews.title: These are great to buy for yourself and also as a gift ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a big fan of all Give'r products and this coozie is no exception. These are great to buy for yourself and also as a gift in just about any situation. It is a must-have for any and all activities where one might want to enjoy a cold beverage, hands-free and look sharp while doing so. Every time I use these coozies, I get many questions and compliments, which has even led to making new friends. Everyone needs these in their life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you like America
customer_reviews.text: This product is as American as apple pie! My shipment arrived today and I've already had the pleasure of grilling hands-free while enjoying an adult beverage that stayed cold even with a hot grill beside me. It works with bottles or cans and I'm sure this will be a huge hit over the 4th weekend and well beyond. I look forward to a long relationship with my coozie and will be checking back to see what else these guys put out there. Getcha some!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE Give'r and all of their products, especially the Neck Coozie! These products are incredibly well made, do their job of keeping my beverages cold and the Red, White & Blue print is perfect for parties. Cannot say enough about this company; I now own many of their products and am a fan through and through.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Give-r does it again
customer_reviews.text: Give-r.com continues to produce outstanding products. Who doesnt love an awesome coozie? Combine that with one that hangs around your neck and allows you to be hands free to enjoy your activity of choice (feeding your baby) while also having easy acces to your drink of choice (cool baby labatt blue)... Money. Design is an absolute plus, especially for the summer season. Highly recommend checking out all give-r.com great products.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

product_meta.title: Give’r Hands Free Neck Coozie | Fits Cans or Bottles | Beer & Beverage Insulator Lanyard Drink Holder (4 Pack)
feature_bullets: LOOK MA NO HANDS x 4 Pack- You and 3 friends are going to have 100% Hands Free Insulation to keep your cold drinks cold, and hot drinks hot.
FITS YOUR FAVES - Your choice of cans or bottles, the Give’r River Runner Neck Coozie measures 4" in height, 2.5" internal diameter (at rest) expandable up to 3.5" in diameter
PUT IT AROUND YOUR NECK & GIVE’R- Neck strap features a 33" lanyard. The top end of the holster rests approximately 6-10" below the base of your neck

BUILT TO LAST - No matter what you call them, neck coolies, coosy, or coozy, ours is made of an ultra durable yet flexible polyester. It’s tough against wear and tear, UV-resistant, and lightweight (1.7oz)
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE - We stand behind our products and strive for nothing short of 100% Customer Satisfaction so go ahead and Give'r!
